isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - COMPONENT LOCATION
